name: Outdoor Technology Kodiak Mini 2.0 2600mAh
description: Tough rubber housing makes this the charger to take on spicy adventures. It’s got a good-sized battery to top up most USB devices, and comes charged so you can use it right out of the box.Rechargeable 2600 mAh lithium-ion battery.Portable and lightweight.Type A female USB port with 1.0 amp output charges most USB powered devices.Charges via standard micro USB port, and includes USB charging cable.100 lumen light, with high, low, and flashing modes, is more than enough to help you see the light.Power gauge LED lets you know your battery’s status, whether charging or discharging.IPX7 rating for resistance to shocks, dust, and water.
